HERO.TITLE: Advanced Solutions to manage your business
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Advanced solutions to manage your business and provide services powered by artificial intelligence.

ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: AI Cloud builds intelligent systems that help organizations streamline operations, automate tasks, and gain real-time insights using AI and IoT technologies. Our platforms are built for scalability, customization, and performance — all under one smart ecosystem.

FEATURES.TITLE: Smart Systems. Seamless Operations.
FEATURES.SUBTITLE: Powerful tools to automate, customize, and secure your workflows — all in one place.
FEATURES.FEATURE1_DESC: We design and develop powerful platforms like Clean Tech, tailored for industries that require automation, real-time monitoring, and centralized control. These systems manage attendance, shifts, tasks, and more — all from a single dashboard.
FEATURES.FEATURE2_DESC: One size doesn't fit all. That's why we build tailor-made software for clients who need specific tools for their workflows.
FEATURES.FEATURE3_DESC: Access actionable insights instantly. Our platforms generate live performance dashboards and KPIs for fast decisions.
FEATURES.FEATURE4_DESC: Our systems come with secure protocols and APIs that sync with ERPs, HR tools, and more.

CAROUSEL.SLIDE1_DESC: Clean Tech helps you manage all your facility operations—from cleanliness to workforce—in one smart dashboard. Get real-time updates, automated tasks, and full visibility across all departments, anytime, anywhere.
CAROUSEL.SLIDE2_DESC: Get notified instantly when stock levels fall below the minimum threshold.

FOOTER.READY_FOR_FUTURE: Ready to move your organization into the future?

HERO.DESCRIPTION: At AI Cloud, we're proud to collaborate with a diverse network of trusted partners — from government authorities and smart cities to universities and innovation hubs. These partnerships play a vital role in delivering intelligent, impactful solutions across the Kingdom.

PARTNERS.TITLE: Our Partners in Success
PARTNERS.DESCRIPTION: Backed by strategic partnerships with top government bodies, educational leaders, and smart innovation hubs — we drive lasting digital and operational transformation across the Kingdom. Together, we're shaping a smarter, cleaner future.

FEATURES-2.TITLE: Together, we drive smart transformation
FEATURES-2.SUBTITLE: Together, we are redefining how cleanliness, operations, and digital transformation are managed.

DIGITAL_CITY.TITLE: Digital City
DIGITAL_CITY.DESC: Partnering with the Digital City to implement smart technologies that enhance urban efficiency, safety, and sustainability.

PNU.TITLE: Princess Nourah University
PNU.DESC: Partnering with the region's leading women's university to deploy smart campus systems and sustainable operations.

PIF.TITLE: Public Investment Fund
PIF.DESC: A strategic collaboration to support national innovation and deploy smart solutions that align with Vision 2030.

KAFD.TITLE: KAFD (King Abdullah Financial District)
KAFD.DESC: Supporting operational excellence and digital transformation in one of Riyadh's most advanced business districts.

SWA.TITLE: Saudi Water Authority
SWA.DESC: Working together to optimize water usage and improve maintenance efficiency using sensor-based technologies.

GACA.TITLE: GACA (General Authority of Civil Aviation)
GACA.DESC: Helping airports and aviation sectors improve cleanliness, safety, and maintenance through real-time smart systems.

VISION.TITLE: Our vision
VISION.DESCRIPTION: Describe what your company is building towards in the future. This vision statement should serve the purpose of selling the dream of the company to hiring talent, investors and partners.

MISSION.TITLE: Our Mission
MISSION.DESCRIPTION: To contribute to the digital transformation of institutions by providing innovative technological solutions and integrated digital services to enhance quality and performance.

LOCATIONS.TITLE: Our Locations
LOCATIONS.SUBTITLE: Find us in multiple countries across the region
